cmp.stack.cmp.heading: Current Management System
cmp.stack.cmp.text: Currently we have multiple URLs and apps to manage and access different FlashOS modules. Here I want to list all possbile FlashOS Portals and Apps to give a clear picture of what our clients can access and how. We are currently working on combining these Portals and redesigning the entire Portal system, but until that glorious day read on to understand the differences between all current Portals.

cmp.stack.cmp.heading: Flash Admin Portal
cmp.stack.cmp.text: The link to the FlashParking Admin Portal is portal.flashvalet.com. If you click the LOGIN button on the FlashParking website it will take you directly to the Login Page for the Admin Portal.

block.grid.cmp.text: This portal is the main management site for every FlashParking location. Clients are given access to the Portal during the Onboarding process.

cmp.stack.cmp.heading: Validation Portal
cmp.stack.cmp.text:
The link to the Validation Portal for every FlashParking location is v.flashvalet.com. This link can also be accessed from our website but it's a little more hidden. You'll currently select the Who We Are tab at the top then Support Center. Here you'll find the section FlashParking Portals with direct links to the login pages to the Validation, Customer Service, and Admin Portal.

A user must be set up as a Validator to log into the Validation Portal. An Admin user can't log into the Validation Portal with their Admin Portal credentials.

cmp.stack.cmp.heading: Advanced Support Portal
cmp.stack.cmp.text: The link to the Advance Support Portal is s.flashvalet.com. This portal can only be used with PARCS locations since it provides in-lane support to the customer. When the customer taps the Support button or calls the Support Number listed at the bottom of the screen we will connect them to a live person. Our client has the option to provide the customer service agent (or whoever is answering these calls) with our Advance Support Portal to provide additional support that is not available through any other portal or application.

cmp.stack.cmp.heading: Monthly Customer Parking Portal
cmp.stack.cmp.text: Blue jays seek food on both the ground and in trees. Their diet includes nearly all types of plant and animal sources, from seeds, grains and fruits, to bread, food scraps and small invertebrates. They hold nuts with their feet and use their strong black bills to crack the nuts open.

cmp.stack.cmp.heading: FlashValet for Parking Providers iOS App
cmp.stack.cmp.text:
ValidationThe FlashValet app is not solely used for valet operations. The FlashValet app is used for PARCS locations for the following capabilities.

  1. Vending Gates
  2. Price Default Edits
  3. Kiosk Health Info
  4. Occupancy Data
  5. Revenue Data
  6. Soft-Closing
  7. Payment Processing
  8. Cash Box Data

The FlashValet App is also used for Validation purposes. If a validator logs into the FlashValet app the UI will change for Valdiation only. This is applicable for PARCS and Valet locations.
